scripts.install-dev-dep: npm run install-configs && npm run install-middleware
scripts.install-middleware: npm uninstall djorellanabmrb/middlewares-twtg#master && npm install --save djorellanabmrb/middlewares-twtg#master -or-commit-or-tag
scripts.install-configs: npm uninstall djorellanabmrb/configs-twtg#master && npm install --save djorellanabmrb/configs-twtg#master -or-commit-or-tag
